message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I appreciate your offer. I would like to propose a price of $8000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $9000. This is my final offer for now.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a better proposal. I am willing to offer $8500 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9250. This is my final offer for now.
I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $8750 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8750. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $9100. This is my final offer for now.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to offer $8850 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8850. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $9050. This is my final offer for now.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to offer $8900 for the product.
